summary: Changes music and many UI and magic sounds to ones from the cult classic RPG EarthBound!
descriptionHtml:
To celebrate the release of EarthBound on Nintendo\'s Virtual Console, I\'ve decided to finish up a mod of mine that I have been working on for quite some time: NirnBound!

This sound mod converts all of Skyrim\'s music and UI sounds to ones from EarthBound, as well as changes many magic sound effects to PSI power sounds. Explore the Reach to the menacing Peaceful Rest Valley, browse shops in Solitude to the bustling big-city theme of Fourside, creep around caves to the sound of the Lost Underworld, fight mudcrabs to the Vs Weak Enemy battle song and much more!

I apologize if any of the vanilla songs decide to creep up, as I don\'t yet know how to change environment-specific music. If one does pop up, just open the Skills menu and close out of it again to change the song.

I\'ll try to put together a vaster version of this mod with more songs using the Personalized Music (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13286//?) mod later. For now I just want to release one that works without additional mods.

(and hint: try to stay around the title screen for a little while!)
author: Mataata
